name: The Ultimate Dirt Showdown Collection
description:
The Ultimate DiRT Showdown collection includes:
DiRT showdown
Headstart pack, Loaded Liveries pack, Monster Energy Pack, Hoonigan Pack, and VIP Pass

Also included is a 30 days PlayStation Now Rental for DiRT 3 - upon purchase you will need to navigate to the PlayStation Now store to redeem the Rental.

Race, crash and hoon your way through a world tour of motorized mayhem in DiRT® Showdown™! Social gameplay and stunning graphics combine to deliver a high-octane action sports experience from the get-go.


1-2 players
1MB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-8

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
